ComicInfo.Summary:
MAD's ninth annual review of the dumbest people, events and things of the year takes aim at Mel Gibson, Barry Bonds, the Iraq War, Kevin Federline, Kim Jong Il, tainted spinach, Dick Cheney, the Muhammad cartoon controversy and more! Plus, the MAD World of the Holidays, Spy vs. Spy and Monroe!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-11 23:09:19. [Issue ID 129320]
